description: Even before the world was overrun by insatiable 'biters, ' Andrew was indifferent when it came to everything in his life, still struggling with an immense loss. But, with no understanding as to why, his survival instincts kick in during 'the turn, ' and Andrew sets out to find a way to live amongst the undead. Now, he's got to figure out why he bothers to carry on, when all he wants is to end it for good.
title: The Turn
